[Bootstrap's grid layout system](https://quarto.org/docs/output-formats/page-layout.html#css-grid) provides true flexibility. It can get quite complicated.

# Quarto's own formats

There are several article layouts that give you more of the screen.

::: {.aside}
Note you can use these [Quarto layouts](https://quarto.org/docs/authoring/article-layout.html) in any HTML format.
:::
